name: Crazy Beat Line
description:
Welcome to a preview of a demo version of my game called Crazy Beat Line!

Description:

I'm gonna be short: (1) any music, (2) very hard music game, (3) unique personages with their unique abilities, (4) catch the rhythm and have a fun!

Mechanics:

  1. Whichever music you've selected, the game will be creating in realtime a level based on the selected song.
  2. You select (in further updates) personage, which has some superpower to make your beat line easier. I'm gonna add, actually, fully different from each other personages. Any ideas? :)
  3. Combos! x15 brings you superpower realoded! In future, I'd like to add a lot of combos bonuses. In demo, just for preview, I've added this one.
  4. (in further updates) Open the cases to open new personages! No donation here will be, but a real furtune :) I don't, actually, like games, where you can get really rare personage by a donation, indeed.

Control:

  • Key A or Left arrow - left side
  • Key D or Right arrow - right side
  • Key W or Up arrow - use superpower

Music formats:

  • Please, use only .mp3. Other types aren't allowed and the game will never play them.
  • Coming soon: a remote music library. In the next update!

WARNING! if you or anyone in your family has an epileptic condition, do not play this game. By playing the game with this kind of disease, you agree to play at your own peril and risk.
